fields.summary: PlexusIoURLResource.getContents() should provide information about the inaccessible resource in case of an IOException

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.description:
Assembly plugin fails when one of the jars has invalid signature:
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] FATAL ERROR
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Invalid signature file digest for Manifest main attributes
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Trace
java.lang.SecurityException: Invalid signature file digest for Manifest main attributes
	at sun.security.util.SignatureFileVerifier.processImpl(SignatureFileVerifier.java:221)
	at sun.security.util.SignatureFileVerifier.process(SignatureFileVerifier.java:176)
	at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.processEntry(JarVerifier.java:234)
	at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.update(JarVerifier.java:188)
	at java.util.jar.JarFile.initializeVerifier(JarFile.java:321)
	at java.util.jar.JarFile.getInputStream(JarFile.java:386)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.jar.JarURLConnection.getInputStream(JarURLConnection.java:144)
	at java.net.URL.openStream(URL.java:1009)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.resources.PlexusIoURLResource.getContents(PlexusIoURLResource.java:30)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.resources.proxy.PlexusIoProxyResourceWithAttributes.getContents(PlexusIoProxyResourceWithAttributes.java:83)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.util.ResourceUtils.copyFile(ResourceUtils.java:84)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.dir.DirectoryArchiver.copyFile(DirectoryArchiver.java:138)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.dir.DirectoryArchiver.execute(DirectoryArchiver.java:81)
	at org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.AbstractArchiver.createArchive(AbstractArchiver.java:871)
	at org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.archive.archiver.AssemblyProxyArchiver.createArchive(AssemblyProxyArchiver.java:512)
	at org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.archive.DefaultAssemblyArchiver.createArchive(DefaultAssemblyArchiver.java:192)
	at org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.mojos.AbstractAssemblyMojo.execute(AbstractAssemblyMojo.java:413)
	at org.apache.maven.plugin.DefaultPluginManager.executeMojo(DefaultPluginManager.java:490)


It would be very helpful to provide information which JAR resource is corrupt.

Current code:
public InputStream getContents() throws IOException
    {
        return getURL().openStream();
    }
Just catch the exception and throw an IOException providing the private URL in message and encapsulate the caught exception.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body: Fixed in 7c9ebe4caaf7e66a239d6f9e660f46ecdf5367a0, thanks for the suggestion !
